message.entry: Invalid class for input parameter {0,number,integer}: must be double.
Input parameter {0,number,integer} must consist of real values.
Input parameter {0,number,integer} must consist of finite values.
Invalid class for input image: must be uint8, uint16, int16, double, or single.
Input image must have at least three elements in any one dimension.
Input image must consist of real values.
Input image must consist of finite values.
PSF must have at least two elements.
Invalid input: NOISEPOWER must be a scalar.
Invalid input: LRANGE must be a scalar or a two-scalar array.
First value of LRANGE must not exceed the second value.
PSF size must not exceed the image size in any nonsingleton dimension.
REGOP size must not exceed the image size in any nonsingleton dimension.
REGOP nonsingleton dimensions must correspond to PSF nonsingleton dimensions.
